casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jack MOORE. No. 253P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Amu Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of May 2006 by Defendant to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
